application

Class EAddProjectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.EAddProjectionController

  • public class EAddProjectionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows employees to upload new projections for any existing movie. Storing their informations to the designed database table. This is possible through a set of ActionEvent void methods. And multiple comboBox with a defined hierarchy.
    Author:
    Federico Ziviani

      • fillCombo

        public void fillCombo()
        Fills the comboBox listing the movies available retrieving their titles from the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - cannot connect to database when the connection to the database fails. The list of movie can not be displayed.

      • fillTimes

        public void fillTimes(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Fills the comboBox listing the movies available retrieving their titles from the database.
        Parameters:
        e - the event to be executed when the user picks a date from this datePicker.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - cannot connect to database when the connection to the database. The list of movie can not be displayed.

      • savePj

        public void savePj(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Saves this new movie into the database. By storing into the table projections, in the database cinemabookingsys, this title, this date and this time. By getting the value selected in the respective comboBoxes for each of this three String arguments. The label is dynamically set to display this message if the action of saving this new movie has been successful.
        Parameters:
        e - the event to be executed when the user clicks the button to save the new projection.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - cannot connect to database when the connection to the database fails and this action cannot be executed.

      • home

        public void home(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loads the home page. The movies' titles will still be in the comboBox. The method to fill the combo is called from the controller home. That in this case is the Employee Home page.
        Parameters:
        e - the action to be executed when the home button is clicked.
        Throws:
        the - Exception of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.

      • back

        public void back(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loads back the home page. The movies' titles will still be in the comboBox. The method to fill the combo is called from the controller home. That in this case is the Employee Home page.
        Parameters:
        e - action to be executed when the home button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of an invalid fxml file when it tries to loads the page.
